attributes.action: ask the British people what nations they consider in europe and make a offical statement to the EU of those nations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The obvious nations included should be, Swizerland, Norway, Iceland, the micronations .e.g lichinstien, moldova, ukraine, and the already poteintial candidates.

*Belarus and russia although considerd in europe, isolate thereselfs so membership is already unlikely.

*If Turkey joins the EU then Georgia and Armenia shoulds be included so they are not isolated christain countries in asia, but azerbaijan should not as it would take the EU out of porportian extending it too far into asia.
